00028 #include "StochasticDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModel.hpp"
00029 
00030 
00031 StochasticDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModel::StochasticDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModel(double g1Duration, unsigned generation)
00032     : AbstractSimpleGenerationBasedCellCycleModel(g1Duration, generation)
00033 {
00034 }
00035 
00036 
00037 AbstractCellCycleModel* StochasticDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModel::CreateDaughterCellCycleModel()
00038 {
00039     return new StochasticDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModel(mG1Duration, mGeneration);  // use a private constructor that doesn't reset mG1Duration.
00040 }
00041 
00042 
00043 void StochasticDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModel::SetG1Duration()
00044 {
00045     assert(mpCell!=NULL);
00046 
00047     RandomNumberGenerator* p_gen = RandomNumberGenerator::Instance();
00048 
00049     switch (mpCell->GetCellType())
00050     {
00051         case STEM:
00052             mG1Duration = 1 + 4*p_gen->ranf(); // U[1,5] according to Meineke
00053             break;
00054         case TRANSIT:
00055             mG1Duration = 1 + 2*p_gen->ranf(); // U[1,3] according to Meineke
00056             break;
00057         case DIFFERENTIATED:
00058             mG1Duration = DBL_MAX;
00059             break;
00060         default:
00061             NEVER_REACHED;
00062     }
00063 }
